divs: Sighting DetailsThis morning at 5:50 a.m. I became very restless and started to toss and turn trying to get comfortable in my bed, I just could not settle down. As I turned to look toward my bedroom dresser I heard an "click", at the same time of the "click" I saw an "blue-flash" light go from the top of my dresser to my ceiling! I could see the ray of "light" travel from the top of my dresser up to my bedroom ceiling. The size of the light on the ceiling was a little smaller than an basketball. When I turned my bedroom light on, I looked on my dresser and there was nothing there. All I know is the light came from INSIDE of my bedroom, not from the OUTSIDE!! I looked out the window and everything look normal. What could this be? Was the "blue light" the reason I became restless and woke up? I'm confused!! The color of blue reminded of the Blue(Led) light on the laptop computers! (the power light that lightes up in the front) Thanks!
